page.title: 14FROWICK HALL
page.content: Frowick Hall is a beutiful house which is very old in places but has had many improvements. The gardens are landscaped and the owners very pleasant and helpful people. The wife showed us round the Hall and explained that it was a grade three listed building. The land around the Hall amounts to 300 acres and is used for arable farming. Frowick Hall is a house and is not open to the general public. The farm buildings opposite the road, Frowick Lane, have many different machines including tractors, sprayers, and a very big combine harvester. Also on the farm were some chickens, ducks and geese near the small pond and two ponies in a field near the farm building.
